casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, Trustee
v.
Heather BLISS, et. al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 7, 2017

John R. Hall, in support of the petition.

Zachary Grendi, in opposition.

*235The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39610) is denied.
